answer: The cheapest way to get the Control Chip to a factory in Poland is from Supplier A in Germany. The shipping cost is
$2.9, and it takes 6 days to ship to Factory Poland.

text: For Product Alpha, the component Control Chip is supplied by Supplier B in Taiwan.
It is shipped to Factory Poland at a cost of $4.2, taking 18 days and emitting 12.0 kg CO₂.
The factory exports via Port Gdansk, costing $1.1, taking 3 days and emitting 2.5 kg CO₂.
The shipment is imported to Germany with cost $0.8, time 2 days and emissions 1.2 kg CO₂.
